Class Player1

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
Player1
public class Player1 extends greenfoot.Actor
Player1. A Player1 moves forward until it can't do so anymore, at which point it turns left. If a wombat finds a leaf, it eats it.
Version:
1.0.1
Author:
Michael Kolling
